lead_paragraph: Many politicians want to close the carried interest tax loophole for private equity managers. The only problem is, no such loophole exists, Steven B. Klinsky writes.

headline.main: The Carried Interest Loophole? What Loophole?

snippet: Many politicians want to close the carried interest tax loophole for private equity managers. The only problem is, no such loophole exists, Steven B. Klinsky writes....
